localize.text: A long time has passed since my loved ones have left with their broken bodies and hearts.
We’ve finally met, after taking a long detour…
I sent you a letter someday.
That old, strange letter that had the same name on “sender” and “recipient”.
It told you that we will meet soon.
Why are you hesitating? Come, with your mind at ease.
I hope this environment satisfies you. I tried my best to recreate our office.
You need at least one place to feel comfortable, don’t you?
However, I speculate that you felt that this place is a bit more…serene than you might remember.
There are many reasons to that.
This is the reflection of your heart, after all.
We weren’t particularly fond of untidiness. However, there was she, who made a mess out of an organized room.
There were times we were used to such messiness, giving up on cleaning the room.
But, sadly, our hearts couldn’t take those moments in.
I am sure now you know
that this space changes to your heart.
This office is born from your heart, siphoned up from your deepest unconsciousness.
Yes, many parts of this facility were extracted and created from our minds.
How did you think building such enormous underground structures in such short period of time was possible?
We needed multiple extractions until we finally solidified something that had no form.
We repeated so many times, until the memories were blurred, and sins were forgotten.
Yes, there were a lot of repeats.
It must have been roughly 10 years outside, while this entire facility has been trapped in the cycle in length of one hundred thousand years.
This eternity is fascinating.
All humans only live once.
The future comes to us like relentless waves of sea.
We cannot go against them. We are merely pushed back by them.
Time Track’s technology could only reverse time in a very limited area.
This tech was used to trivial things, such as granting the infinite moments of death to a condemned,
or showing those whose times are numbered their happiest times.
However, when combined with our energy tech, this small technology could bloom into something bigger.
We invested on them without hesitation, even though they required massive amount of funding and energy.
That’s how Time Track’s second invention came to life.
If time can be reversed infinitely, we could reach the sky which seemed unreachable.
But sadly, breaking an absolute rule cost us a lot.
The reverse, although it could be executed infinitely, always left some form of distortion. This technology is not perfect yet, either.
No man could have their sanity intact in this place.
But here you are. You reached this point, even though you limped on the way.
Of course, it wouldn’t have been possible if it were not for Angela, but it is a herculean achievement that you went through that journey.
Let your body and mind rest. You must be exhausted.
The path after this will be brutal.
Extremely brutal.
Me and “us” that you will meet again will be also brutal.
They will not let you pass like I do.
By any chance, if you think you’re not ready yet, it is okay to go back to the starting point.
If you have reached here after such a long time,
you will come again, no matter how long it takes.
We literally have all the time in the world. There is no need to be hurry.
Just keep in mind that situation will be very much different if you move forward from here.
You will be given harsh trials and unanswered, saturated questions.
And, I think you already know that,
You can reverse time,
but you can’t reverse a tale.
